main_text:
Modern Aesthetics and the Problem of Erotic Art
2. Modern Aesthetics and the Problem of Erotic Art 

Are there überhaupt any works of erotic art? This may
seem a silly question, especially to anyone who is familiar with art
history and with the well-established tradition of erotic art in
particular. But to students of modern aesthetics, that is, the
philosophy of art and beauty from roughly the beginning of the
18th century to the end of the 19th century,
that question will not appear absurd at all.
section_title: 2. Modern Aesthetics and the Problem of Erotic Art
